translation.en: [priest] Lord, have mercy on us.
[congregation] Christ, have mercy on us.
[priest] Lord, have mercy on us. Christ, hear us.
translation.fr:
Seigneur, aie pitié de nous.
Jésus, entends-nous.

translation.en: [congregation] Christ, graciously hear us.
[priest] God, the Father in heaven.
translation.fr: Notre Père qui es aux cieux.

translation.en: [congregation] Have mercy on us.
God, the Holy Ghost.
[congregation] Have mercy on us.
The Holy Trinity, one God.
translation.fr: La Sainte Trinité, le Dieu unique.

translation.en: [congregation] Have mercy on us.
Good night, Joe. Good night, Father.
translation.fr:
- Bonne nuit, Joe.
- Bonne nuit, mon père.

translation.en: Dennis, your minute steak's getting cold.
Confession went late.
Agnes Samson thought about stealing her sister's watch.
translation.fr:
Agnes Samson envisageait
de voler la montre de sa sœur.

translation.en: Took a good ten minutes to convince her that wasn't a sin.
translation.fr:
J'ai dû la convaincre
que ce n'était rien.

translation.en: Well, Dennis, this is Father Adeyemi.
Visiting the archdiocese from Nigeria.
My pleasure. Welcome to California.
Ah, thank you.
Eat up, McMurtry.
Miracle on 34th Street is playing at the Westmont. Ah.
translation.fr:
Le Miracle sur la 34e rue
passe au Westmont.

translation.en: Will you be joining us, Father McMurtry?
I'll stay in tonight, thanks.
It's been raining pretty hard, and I think I'm coming down with something.
translation.fr:
Il pleut, et je crois que
je couve quelque chose.

translation.en: [man] Suit yourself.
Hello, ladies.
[man] Hi.
Can I help you?
Sorry to bother you.
My car broke down up the road, and it's getting cold out.
translation.fr:
Ma voiture est en panne,
je suis frigorifié.

translation.en: I hate to ask, but I wonder if I could use your phone?
translation.fr:
Ça me gêne,
mais puis-je emprunter votre téléphone ?

translation.en: Oh, sure. Please, come in, dry off.
Thank you very much.
The… the telephone is in the parlor if you'd like to call the garage.
translation.fr:
Le téléphone est dans le petit salon,
appelez donc le garage.

translation.en: Can I make you a cup of coffee?
That'd be nice. Thanks.
[Dennis] Where are you coming from?
All over, I guess.
You're welcome to that, if you're hungry.
I'll eat it later.
Fantastic. Just fantastic, Monsignor.
That was magical.
I'm glad you enjoyed it.
translation.fr: Ravi que ça vous ait plu.

translation.en: [man] Oh, boy.
I'll put on some coffee, warm us up. Thank you.
translation.fr:
- Un petit café nous réchauffera.
- Merci.

translation.en: [man] That's probably a new experience.
translation.fr: Ça doit être nouveau, pour vous.

translation.en: [man] Yes. She is magnificent.
-Sleep well. -Thank you, Monsignor.
-Glad you enjoyed it. -Good night.
translation.fr: Ravi que ça vous ait plu.

translation.en: -Good night. -Thanks again, Monsignor.
What's going on?
Hello, Monsignor.
Sister Margaret McGuire,
you remember her?
She was my mother.
You're my dad, Monsignor.
That's…
that's nonsense.
[breathing fast] All right, all right, I knew her.
W… we did things together, but she wanted it.
translation.fr:
On a fait des choses ensemble,
mais elle en avait envie.

translation.en: She ended up in a whore house.
translation.fr: Elle a fini dans un bordel.

translation.en: One of them shot her up with morphine…
translation.fr:
On lui a injecté de la morphine,
et ça l'a tuée.

translation.en: -[screams] Please forgive me! -…and it killed her.
translation.fr:
On lui a injecté de la morphine,
et ça l'a tuée. Pardonnez-moi !

translation.en: And I got sent to an orphanage.
Look, you've got to understand.
[voice wavering] I'm a sinner.
I've suffered for my sins.
No, no, no, no, no.
Now you're gonna suffer.
Here's that map you asked for, ma'am.
translation.fr: La carte que vous avez demandée.

translation.en: Thank you.
[man] May I ask why you're headed to Lucia?
It seems like a rather personal question, now, doesn't it?
translation.fr:
C'est une question personnelle,
n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: Sorry.
Clearly your tumescence has distracted you, sir.
I recall asking for today's local paper.
Oh! Sorry.
Here you go.
Yeah, it's big news around here.
translation.fr: On ne parle que de ça, en ce moment.

translation.en: Everybody's up in arms.
Fella cuts up a bunch of priests and they ship him up to Lucia?
translation.fr:
Il tue des prêtres,
et on l'envoie à Lucia ?

translation.en: Hey, that's where you're headed.
translation.fr: Hé, c'est là que vous allez !

translation.en: You're not some sort of journalist or something, are you?
You should bathe more often.
Your fingernails are filthy.
[sighs] What do I owe the pleasure?
I have a reservation.
What's the name?
Ratched. Mildred Ratched.
Vultures, all of them.
San Francisco Chronicle is offering $5,000
to whoever gets the first shot of the Clergy Killer.
translation.fr:
pour la première photo
du tueur de prêtres.

translation.en: You're not a vulture, are you?
No, ma'am.
I'm a nurse.
Ice machine's at the end in the interior of the breezeway.
translation.fr:
La machine à glaçons
est au bout de la passerelle.

translation.en: We provide that machine as a courtesy,
translation.fr: Nous offrons ce service à titre gracieux,

translation.en: so I wouldn't abuse that privilege if I were you.
translation.fr: je n'en abuserais pas, si j'étais vous.

translation.en: I pay very close attention
to how much ice is in that machine at any given time.
translation.fr:
la quantité de glace qui s'y trouve
à tout moment.

translation.en: [muttering] God damn it.
May I offer help with the key?
translation.fr: Puis-je vous aider avec la clé ?

translation.en: Not much to look at, but we've got a phone in the office.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas un palace,
mais il y a le téléphone à la réception.

translation.en: Thank you.
And just so you know, if you happen to have any gentlemen callers,
translation.fr:
Pour information,
si jamais vous avez des visiteurs,

translation.en: I'm going to know about it.
And I do not run a house of ill repute.
translation.fr: Cet hôtel n'est pas une maison close.

translation.en: Do you understand me?
[Mildred] Hello, I'm here to speak with Dr. Hanover.
translation.fr: Bonjour, j'aimerais parler au Dr Hanover.

translation.en: It's a pleasure to meet you, sir.
Sir, it is a pleasure to meet you.
I have come quite a long way and would just like to speak with him.
translation.fr:
Je viens de loin,
j'aimerais m'entretenir avec lui.

translation.en: [man] Priest killer must die!
translation.fr: Le tueur de prêtres doit mourir !

translation.en: I have an appointment. Thank you.
Can I help you? Hello. I'm here to speak with Dr. Hanover.
translation.fr:
- Puis-je vous aider ?
- J'aimerais parler au Dr Hanover.

translation.en: I'm sorry, darlin'. He's not talking to press right now.
translation.fr: Désolée, il refuse de parler à la presse.

translation.en: Oh, I'm not the press. I'm the new night shift nurse.
translation.fr:
Non, je suis
la nouvelle infirmière de nuit.

translation.en: Dr. Hanover hasn't technically hired me yet,
but I'm supposed to have a formal interview with him at 11:00,
translation.fr:
mais je suis censée avoir
un entretien avec lui à 11 h,

translation.en: as this letter clearly states.
[chuckles] Okay, one second. I'm just gonna go get a nurse. Oh, I'm sorry.
translation.fr:
- Je vais chercher une infirmière.
- Excusez-moi.

translation.en: You aren't a nurse? Me? No.
translation.fr:
- Vous n'êtes pas infirmière ?
- Moi ? Non.

translation.en: I'm a nurse trainee.
I admire nurses more than anything.
translation.fr: J'admire les infirmières plus que tout.

translation.en: They really are God's angels.
Yes. Yes, we are.
Okay, be right back.
[man] Hiya.
Have a nice day.
[woman] My preliminary recommendation is this:
that if Mr. Salvatore wants the board to seriously consider a furlough,
translation.fr:
si M. Salvatore souhaite
obtenir une permission,

translation.en: he must continue with Dr. Hanover's regimen of colonics,
translation.fr:
il doit poursuivre les lavements
ordonnés par le Dr Hanover,

translation.en: he must attend group therapy three times daily,
translation.fr:
assister à trois séances de groupe
par jour,

translation.en: and he must take his saltpeter tablets as prescribed.
translation.fr:
et prendre le salpêtre
qui lui est prescrit.

translation.en: Am I understood?
Si. Si.
[girl] Nurse Bucket?
You're needed at nurse's station one.
Excuse me.
There's a letter.
Where did you get this?
You must be the head nurse.
Mildred Ratched.
I didn't ask what your name was.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas demandé votre nom.

translation.en: Where did you get the letter?
Why, it was sent to me.
That's where I'm confused,
because there is no one in his office except for Dr. Hanover and myself.
translation.fr:
Il n'y a que le Dr Hanover et moi
dans ce bureau.

translation.en: I didn't send that.
translation.fr:
Je ne l'ai pas envoyée,
et je peux vous assurer

translation.en: And I can assure you, that isn't Dr. Hanover's signature.
translation.fr:
Je ne l'ai pas envoyée,
et je peux vous assurer que ce n'est pas sa signature.

translation.en: I have come quite a long way and would just like to speak with him.
translation.fr:
Je viens de loin,
j'aimerais m'entretenir avec lui.

translation.en: Dr. Hanover is out of the office till later this afternoon.
translation.fr:
Le Dr Hanover est absent
jusqu'à la fin de l'après-midi.

translation.en: If you'd like to leave a number--
If you don't mind, I'd prefer to wait here.
translation.fr: Si possible, je préfère attendre ici.

translation.en: He'll be gone some time.
You just said he'd return in the afternoon.
It could be longer. Well, then it could be shorter.
translation.fr:
- Peut-être plus tard.
- Ou plus tôt.

translation.en: By your own logic.
I truly don't mind waiting.
I have nowhere else to be.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien d'autre de prévu.

translation.en: Very well.
-[door opens] -[woman] I'm sorry, Dr. Hanover.
The governor's going to have to reschedule. Maybe next month.
translation.fr:
Le gouverneur doit reporter.
Peut-être le mois prochain.

translation.en: Another?
No, thank you. Got a long journey back.
translation.fr: Non merci. J'ai de la route.

translation.en: …on second thought…
Good afternoon.
Good afternoon, Governor.
I have your booth in the back for you. Right this way.
translation.fr: Votre table est prête. Veuillez me suivre.

translation.en: [Dr. Hanover] Excuse me, Gov. Wilburn.
Dr. Richard Hanover.
-I know who you are. -We had a meeting scheduled today.
You're the guy who runs the loony bin in Lucia.
translation.fr: Vous dirigez l'asile de fous de Lucia.

translation.en: I prefer the term "psychiatric rehabilitation facility."
We had a similar meeting scheduled last month, and the month before that.
translation.fr:
Nous avions déjà rendez-vous
le mois dernier, et le mois d'avant.

translation.en: Maybe we should hear him out.
translation.fr: Écoutons ce qu'il a à dire.

translation.en: Tell you what, I'll give you until the moment our drinks are delivered for you to give me your pitch.
translation.fr:
Je vous écoute, vous avez jusqu'à
l'arrivée de nos boissons.

translation.en: Excuse me, do you mind? I didn't invite you to sit.
translation.fr:
- Excusez-moi, je peux ?
- Non, vous ne pouvez pas.

translation.en: You see, Governor, I don't run a loony bin.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un asile de fous.

translation.en: My hospital is a bastion of recovery and rehabilitation unlike any other.
translation.fr:
Mon hôpital est un centre de soins
unique au monde.

translation.en: Now, as for the funding, I'm currently constructing a barn
to be used in various therapeutic regimens.
-And people are-- -And… time's up.
We can maybe meet again in a month or so, or…
Thank you for your time, Governor. Yeah.
Interesting.
[man] Looking good today, Miss Dolly. [Dolly] Thanks, Harold.
translation.fr:
- Vous êtes ravissante, Mlle Dolly.
- Merci, Harold.

translation.en: [chuckles] Whatcha up to? Just making my rounds.
Excuse me.
Where can I find your restroom?
Down the hall to the left.
translation.fr: Au bout du couloir, à gauche.

translation.en: Thank you.
You're welcome.
Looking good today, Mildred.
[Dr. Hanover] Is there something specific you needed, Nurse Bucket?
I'm afraid there's a woman here.
translation.fr: Il y a une femme à côté.

translation.en: She says she has a job interview with you.
I didn't agree to any such thing.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien convenu de tel.

translation.en: Get rid of her, please.
I tried, she's very insistent.
I'll take care of it.
You. Are you the one who's here for the interview?
translation.fr: C'est vous qui êtes là pour l'entretien ?

translation.en: Yes, an interview that was supposed to start several hours ago.
translation.fr:
Oui, un entretien prévu
il y a plusieurs heures de cela.

translation.en: Forgive me, Dr. Hanover, I know your work is very important.
translation.fr: Je sais que votre travail est important,

translation.en: But I, too, value my time.
But I suppose if you were willing to conduct the interview right now,
I could try my best to look past the insult.
Your office is this way?
Uh, yeah. Right this way.
I apologize for the mix-up.
If I'm being honest, I don't recall consenting to any sort of an interview.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai pas souvenir
d'avoir accepté cet entretien.

translation.en: That's quite all right, Doctor.
With a nursing staff as unexceptional as the one you have,
certain clerical errors are bound to happen.
translation.fr: il faut s'attendre à des erreurs.

translation.en: Nurse Bucket, a moment, please.
Please, take a seat.
[Mildred] I hope it's not inappropriate, Doctor, to confess something,
translation.fr:
Docteur, j'espère qu'il n'est pas déplacé
de préciser

translation.en: but I was a nurse in the Pacific theater during the war.
translation.fr: que j'ai exercé pendant la guerre.

translation.en: Where exactly were you stationed?
I island-hopped with Admiral Nimitz's boys,
translation.fr: J'ai suivi les troupes de l'amiral Nimitz

translation.en: from Tarawa, to Saipan, to Okinawa.
You'll see that's where I became familiar with administering anesthetics.
translation.fr:
C'est là que je me suis formée
en anesthésie.

translation.en: I'm well versed in all the blood derivatives,
translation.fr: Je connais bien les produits sanguins,

translation.en: oxygen therapy, and, of course, the treatment of shock.
translation.fr:
l'oxygénothérapie
et, bien sûr, les électrochocs.

translation.en: Do you have scat throwers here?
Patients who throw their feces?
translation.fr:
Des patients
qui lancent leurs déjections ?

translation.en: Oh, yes. In fact, we do.
Well, that won't faze me.
I've encountered many cases of soldiers with battle fatigue,
translation.fr:
J'ai connu de nombreux cas
de soldats traumatisés,

translation.en: who lost their wits entirely.
Men who would try to rape a woman if they could get a hold of her,
translation.fr:
Des hommes qui tentaient
de violer des femmes,

translation.en: and when they couldn't, would content themselves by throwing excrement…
translation.fr:
et se consolaient des refus
en lançant des déjections,

translation.en: ejaculate...
But I was not deterred, Doctor.
translation.fr: Mais ça ne m'a pas découragée.

translation.en: In fact, I was invigorated…
because I was a member of the most unsung profession we have in this country.
translation.fr:
car j'exerçais le métier
le plus mésestimé du pays.

translation.en: We had a saying in the Corps,
"Save one life, and you're a hero."
translation.fr: "Sauvez une vie, vous êtes un héros.

translation.en: "Save 100 lives…
[voice wavering] …well, then you're a nurse."
I must say you're a very impressive woman, Miss Ratched.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes une femme impressionnante,
Mlle Ratched.

translation.en: And clearly passionate.
-But unfortunately-- -May I venture one last query, Doctor?
Do you believe the human mind can be cured?
translation.fr:
Croyez-vous que l'esprit
puisse être guéri ?

translation.en: I do.
But it's not about belief.
translation.fr: Il ne s'agit pas de croyance.

translation.en: It requires no act of faith.
I've seen it with my own eyes.
translation.fr: Je l'ai vu de mes propres yeux.

translation.en: I have not.
But I hope you'll believe me when I tell you
translation.fr: Mais croyez-moi si je vous dis

translation.en: it is all I want in the world.
translation.fr: que c'est mon vœu le plus cher.

translation.en: Miss Ratched, you're…
one of the more interesting women I've had the pleasure of meeting,
translation.fr:
l'une des femmes les plus intéressantes
que je connaisse.

translation.en: but I'm sad to say that until I can secure more funding from the state,
translation.fr:
Mais, hélas,
à moins d'obtenir d'autres subventions,

translation.en: I simply don't have the resources to bring you on.
translation.fr: je n'ai pas les moyens de vous recruter.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
But when there is an opening, please trust that I will consider you.
translation.fr:
Dès qu'un poste sera libre,
je penserai à vous.

translation.en: Well…
if there's one thing I've learned, Doctor…
translation.fr: s'il y a une chose que j'ai apprise,

translation.en: it's that life can be quite unpredictable.
translation.fr: c'est que la vie peut être imprévisible.

translation.en: Thank you for your time.
[Nurse Bucket] The sheets were not ironed correctly, the bedpans were a disgrace,
translation.fr:
Les draps étaient mal repassés,
les bassins, une véritable honte,

translation.en: and Amelia, too much smiling.
I mean, could we have less teeth and more work?
translation.fr:
Moins de dents et plus de travail,
je vous prie.

translation.en: Thank you all for your help.
And the towels, were they folded by the blind?
translation.fr:
Et qui a plié les serviettes,
des aveugles ?

translation.en: Hello.
I'm looking for Amelia Emerson.
She's not home, and I'm about to head out on a sales call. Something I can help you with?
translation.fr:
Elle n'est pas là, et je dois partir.
Puis-je vous aider ?

translation.en: Oh, I'm just an old high school friend passing through town.
translation.fr:
Je suis une vieille amie de lycée
de passage en ville.

translation.en: Maybe you could give her a message? What was your name?
translation.fr:
- Puis-je lui laisser un message ?
- Et vous êtes ?

translation.en: Arlene. Arlene Bauer.
[man over radio] The question is, is this an attempt at avoiding the death penalty,
translation.fr:
Est-ce une manœuvre
pour éviter la peine de mort,

translation.en: or is Edmund Tolleson really crazy?
translation.fr: ou Edmund Tolleson est-il vraiment fou ?

translation.en: He's being transported from San Quentin Prison  for psychiatric evaluation.
translation.fr:
Il quitte la prison de San Quentin
pour un examen psychiatrique.

translation.en: Law enforcement is keeping some of the details under wraps,
translation.fr: Les autorités n'ont pas tout dévoilé,

translation.en: but word is that one of the victims was almost beheaded.
translation.fr:
mais une victime
aurait été quasiment décapitée.

translation.en: [man 2] That concludes our special report on the Clergy Killer.
translation.fr:
Ainsi s'achève notre bulletin
sur le tueur de prêtres.

translation.en: -And now… -Do you think you could do me a favor?
This killer gives me the chills, and I'm not talking Bela Lugosi chills.
translation.fr:
Ce tueur me fiche des frissons,
et pas comme Bela Lugosi.

translation.en: Although, I'd sell my soul for a date with him.
translation.fr:
Je vendrais mon âme
pour un rendez-vous avec lui.

translation.en: I'd let him sink his teeth into me and suck me dry
translation.fr:
Je le laisserais planter ses crocs
dans mon cou et me vider de mon sang

translation.en: as if he really were Count Dracula.
If you could just do--
translation.fr:
- Vous...
- J'ai lu tous les journaux,

translation.en: I read all these papers, and none of them describe
translation.fr:
- Vous...
- J'ai lu tous les journaux, aucun ne dit ce que cet Edmund
a vraiment fait à ces prêtres.

translation.en: what this Edmund fella actually did to those priests.
translation.fr:
aucun ne dit ce que cet Edmund
a vraiment fait à ces prêtres.

translation.en: Now, what favor can I do for you?
If anyone calls asking for Arlene Bauer, could you let me know?
translation.fr:
Si quelqu'un demande Arlene Bower,
pouvez-vous me prévenir ?

translation.en: It's a little joke between me and an old friend.
translation.fr: C'est une blague entre une amie et moi.

translation.en: And is Arlene Bauer paying for another night's room,
translation.fr: Et cette Arlene Bower va payer sa chambre,

translation.en: or are you two splitting the bill?
A smile like that could melt ice.
translation.fr: Un sourire à faire fondre la glace.

translation.en: So I've been told.
Well, I don't like it.
A lady in my position could go so far as to say you're leering.
translation.fr:
Une dame telle que moi
pourrait y voir de la lubricité.

translation.en: A gentleman in my position can't help it
translation.fr:
Un homme tel que moi
ne peut s'en empêcher

translation.en: when he's staring at a beautiful woman like yourself.
translation.fr: face à une aussi belle femme.

translation.en: No, I'm not married.
translation.fr: Non, je ne suis pas mariée.

translation.en: I've never done this before.
Do you think we could just sit?
Actually, can you sit on that corner?
So what do we do now?
Let's pretend we're husband and wife who've just had a fight.
translation.fr:
Mettons que nous sommes un couple
en pleine dispute.

translation.en: What was the fight about?
Children.
You want them, but I don't.
I believe they're nothing but a burden,
translation.fr: Je les considère comme un fardeau,

translation.en: but you believe a family isn't a family without them.
translation.fr:
mais pour vous, sans eux,
ce n'est pas une famille.

translation.en: What are you doing?
So when do we make up?
We don't.
You leave.
Why would I leave?
Because…
you'll think you're right,
and I'll think I'm right.
Then we'll both realize it's not going to work.
translation.fr:
Puis on se rendra compte
que ça ne marchera pas.

translation.en: And then we'll get a divorce.
Only to find soon after that I'm pregnant.
translation.fr:
Juste avant d'apprendre
que je suis enceinte.

translation.en: And you will convince me to keep it.
translation.fr: Vous me convaincrez de le garder.

translation.en: And then you'll die.
I'll raise it for a few years till I can't do it anymore,
translation.fr:
Je l'élèverai quelques années,
jusqu'à ne plus pouvoir,

translation.en: and then I will leave her on a doorstep.
translation.fr: puis je l'abandonnerai devant une porte.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I don't see what the problem is.
translation.fr: Pardon, je ne vois pas où est le problème.

translation.en: When you're ready, you know where to find me.
translation.fr:
Quand vous serez prête,
vous savez où me trouver.

translation.en: [groans] Is that all you got?
Arlene Bauer,
you have a phone call.
You should take your coat off.
It's warm in here.
Do you need a drink?
Walter is an excellent bartender.
Look, I don't know what you think you saw.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas ce que vous avez cru voir.

translation.en: Oh, I know what I saw.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que j'ai vu.

translation.en: What is it you want?
Your job.
And since there aren't any positions available,
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de poste disponible,

translation.en: I have been forced to create one myself.
translation.fr: je suis forcée de m'en créer un.

translation.en: What makes you think my husband will believe you?
And what am I supposed to tell him?
translation.fr: Et que suis-je censée lui dire ?

translation.en: Tell him this town is poison…
translation.fr: Dites-lui que cette ville est toxique

translation.en: and that you want to get as far away from it as possible.
translation.fr:
et que vous voulez vous en éloigner
autant que possible.

translation.en: For your daughter.
[woman] How would you feel about your hospital
being the cornerstone of the governor's reelection campaign?
translation.fr:
la pierre angulaire
de la campagne électorale du gouverneur ?

translation.en: What is there to say? I'm… [chuckles]
I'm speechless.
Your facility,
your bold new ideas,
their proven results,
this will force voters to see the governor in a whole new light.
translation.fr:
Cela obligera les électeurs
à voir le gouverneur sous un autre jour.

translation.en: Not as a musty old bureaucrat, but as a forward-thinking progressive.
translation.fr:
Pas comme un vieux fonctionnaire,
mais comme un progressiste visionnaire.

translation.en: A leader who can rehabilitate a lost segment of the state workforce
translation.fr:
Un meneur capable
de réhabiliter les oubliés

translation.en: and move them back into the economy.
translation.fr: et de les réinsérer dans notre économie.

translation.en: I believe this will swing momentum back to us…
translation.fr:
Je pense que cela relancera
notre dynamique...

translation.en: and the governor into his reelection.
So, Doctor.
What do you say?
[Nurse Bucket] I can't believe it, sir.
Our hospital. I mean, your hospital…
…finally getting the recognition it deserves.
translation.fr: Enfin reconnu à sa juste valeur.

translation.en: This is everything we've ever wanted. We have work to do.
translation.fr:
- C'était notre rêve.
- Nous avons du travail.

translation.en: Nowhere do I want anything greater than a ten-to-one patient-to-staff ratio.
translation.fr:
Pas plus de dix patients par employé.
C'est clair ?

translation.en: -Is that clear? -That could be difficult, sir.
Why is that difficult, Nurse Bucket?
Well, sir, it's Amelia. She hasn't shown up yet.
translation.fr: Eh bien, Amelia n'est pas encore arrivée.

translation.en: What about Jackie?
She's on vacation in Monterey.
And who approved that? You, I imagine.
translation.fr: Qui a approuvé cela ? Vous, j'imagine.

translation.en: Mm, Dr. Hanover, service came for you.
Phone call. A Dr. Richard Hanover.
This is a big day for all of us.
translation.fr: C'est un grand jour pour nous.

translation.en: Doctors, nurses, and low-level attendants.
It is imperative that we live up to the expectations
translation.fr:
Il est crucial d'être à la hauteur
des attentes

translation.en: that attracted Gov. Wilburn's attention.
translation.fr: qui ont attiré l'attention du gouverneur.

translation.en: It is our moment to prove why this hospital is so special.
translation.fr:
C'est l'occasion de montrer
ce que cet hôpital a de spécial.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
[Mildred] Me?
I'm… I'm just here to help.
Every square inch of this facility needs to be spotless.
translation.fr:
Le moindre recoin de l'hôpital
doit être impeccable.

translation.en: Every surface, I should be able to eat runny eggs off of it.
translation.fr:
Je dois pouvoir manger
sur n'importe quelle surface.

translation.en: [Nurse Bucket] Unruly patients need to be humanely tamed…
translation.fr:
Les patients turbulents
doivent être maîtrisés humainement...

translation.en: and tranquil.
And you must all perform your duties
in the utmost professional manner possible.
Do I make myself clear?
-[overlapping chatter] -Absolutely. Thank you so much.
translation.fr: Tout à fait, Betsy. Merci beaucoup.

translation.en: Good. Now let's get to it.
-[people shouting] -[man] Governor!
[man] Mio fratello… [sobbing] Mio fratello…
voglio stare con te.
The new barn will become the heartbeat of Lucia,
translation.fr: La nouvelle grange sera le cœur de Lucia.

translation.en: using all the latest advances in assisted therapy
translation.fr:
On y utilisera
des méthodes thérapeutiques de pointe

translation.en: to calm even the most troubled mind before we even begin administering a single medication.
translation.fr:
pour calmer les esprits les plus troublés
avant même de prescrire le moindre cachet.

translation.en: That's marvelous. That's wonderful! Do you hear that, guys?
[man] Yes, sir.
-Please, no. -[camera flash clicks]
translation.fr: Non, je ne veux pas être photographié.

translation.en: -I do not wish to be photographed. -What about Edmund Tolleson?
translation.fr: Non, je ne veux pas être photographié. Et Edmund Tolleson ?

translation.en: What precautions have you taken to ensure your patients' and staff's safety when he arrives?
translation.fr:
Quelles mesures de sécurité
avez-vous prises en vue de son arrivée ?

translation.en: -Where are you gonna chain him up? -All right, come on.
Well, we don't chain anyone up.
He's a human being.
But as for the logistical problems of housing Mr. Tolleson,
translation.fr:
Sur le plan logistique,
en vue de l'accueil de M. Tolleson,

translation.en: we found a solution that's both canny and budget-conscious.
translation.fr:
nous avons trouvé une solution
astucieuse et économique.

translation.en: As you may know, this facility was formerly a rest spa.
translation.fr:
Vous le savez peut-être,
il s'agit d'un ancien spa.

translation.en: It actually has a wine cellar deep underground.
translation.fr: Il y a même une cave à vin au sous-sol.

translation.en: We've transformed that space into a maximum-security holding area
translation.fr:
Nous en avons fait
une zone de détention haute sécurité

translation.en: where Edmund will be housed until he is evaluated.
translation.fr: où Edmund sera logé jusqu'à son examen.

translation.en: A wine cellar. Are you kidding me?
translation.fr: Une cave à vin ? C'est une blague ?

translation.en: Come on now.
Edmund Tolleson is not the story I brought you here to cover. It certainly isn't the one you're going to run!
translation.fr:
Vous n'êtes pas là
pour parler d'Edmund Tolleson !

translation.en: [Nurse Bucket] Dr. Hanover!
It's Father Murphy.
Get me a blanket. We need to make sure he stays warm.
-What's going on? -He collapsed.
What are you doing? Don't touch him!
translation.fr: Que faites-vous ? Ne le touchez pas.

translation.en: Don't you ever lay a hand on me!
translation.fr: Ne vous avisez pas de me toucher.

translation.en: How dare you!
Just wait for it!
There, there. Keep breathing, keep breathing.
Stay with us, Father.
His blood pressure was dangerously low.
The shock nearly killed him.
translation.fr: Le choc a failli le tuer.

translation.en: Did you say shock?
I think someone gave him the wrong medication.
translation.fr:
On a dû lui donner
le mauvais médicament.

translation.en: [Wilburn] Hey there, Mister. Gov. Wilburn, how about a picture with me?
-Come on. Let's go. -Look this way, please.
Look into the camera, there you go. Big smile!
What's wrong with him?
They just told him that his brother passed away, poor thing.
translation.fr:
Ils viennent de lui annoncer
la mort de son frère, le pauvre.

translation.en: Not that it would have mattered.
translation.fr: Même si ça n'aurait rien changé.

translation.en: He didn't know, but he wasn't getting furloughed anyway.
translation.fr:
Il l'ignorait,
mais il n'aurait jamais eu sa permission.

translation.en: His nephew called, said they didn't want him let out.
translation.fr:
Son neveu a appelé,
sa famille ne veut pas qu'on le libère.

translation.en: [Wilburn] Look here.
[man] Look up and smile.
Miss Ratched, would you come with me, please?
Doctor. The governor would like a word--
How is the patient? Did he pull through?
Y-- yes.
Fantastic. Look, I told the reporters and the photographers to go upstairs.
translation.fr:
Formidable.
J'ai dit à la presse d'aller à l'étage.

translation.en: You'll be on one side of the bed, I'll be on the other, handing you the check for $75,000.
translation.fr:
Vous, d'un côté du lit, moi, de l'autre,
vous tendant un chèque de 75 000 $.

translation.en: -The patient will be in the middle. -Wha--
I don't understand.
Doctor, a dozen reporters just saw a member of your staff save a man's life.
translation.fr:
Une douzaine de journalistes ont vu
une infirmière sauver une vie.

translation.en: Let's not discourage them from putting that in the story,
and let's make sure they have a photo to go with that story.
translation.fr: avec une belle photo pour l'accompagner.

translation.en: I told you, I don't do photographs.
-We have-- -You're fine.
She's the one that saved his life. I choose her.
translation.fr: C'est elle qui l'a sauvé. Qu'elle vienne.

translation.en: All right, gentlemen, one more shot and we're done.
Great. Let's get one with the two of us. Huh?
translation.fr: Bien, prenons-en une tous les deux.

translation.en: Please don't put your hand on me like that.
translation.fr: Ne posez pas votre main ici.

translation.en: Thank you.
Well, I guess she works here now.
[Mildred] Hello, Mr. Salvatore.
I'm sorry about your brother.
I know how you feel right now,
translation.fr: J'imagine ce que ça doit faire

translation.en: not being able to be with him.
translation.fr: de ne pas pouvoir être avec lui.

translation.en: Told that you're mad…
when that's what's driving you mad.
translation.fr: alors que c'est cela qui vous rend fou.

translation.en: Isn't it?
I know how that feels.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que ça fait.

translation.en: I had a brother.
He was the only family I ever had.
Well, the only family I ever knew, anyway.
translation.fr: Enfin, la seule que j'aie jamais connue.

translation.en: I remember my mother and father, but I can't picture them.
translation.fr:
Je me souviens de mes parents,
mais pas de leurs visages.

translation.en: All I remember is a…
translation.fr: Je ne me souviens que d'un...

translation.en: a feeling.
You see, I was taken away from them when I was very young…
translation.fr:
On m'a emmenée loin d'eux
quand j'étais toute petite

translation.en: and told that someday I would see them again.
translation.fr:
et on m'a dit qu'un jour,
je les reverrais.

translation.en: That they would come for me.
But that was a lie.
They never did.
And so all I had was my brother.
And then he was taken away from me too.
translation.fr: Et il m'a été enlevé, lui aussi.

translation.en: And he needed me.
translation.fr: Mais il avait besoin de moi.

translation.en: He really needed me…
translation.fr: Il avait vraiment besoin de moi.

translation.en: and I was helpless.
There was nothing I could do to protect him anymore.
translation.fr:
Je ne pouvais plus rien faire
pour le protéger.

translation.en: Right now, there's something difficult I have to tell you.
translation.fr: J'ai un aveu difficile à vous faire.

translation.en: The doctors and nurses here, they want to give you hope…
translation.fr:
Les médecins et les infirmières
veulent vous donner l'espoir

translation.en: that one day you can leave here and see your family again.
translation.fr:
qu'un jour, vous pourrez partir
et revoir votre famille.

translation.en: But you deserve someone to show you mercy, Mr. Salvatore,
translation.fr:
Vous méritez un peu plus de compassion,
M. Salvatore.

translation.en: and so I have to tell you
that I know for a fact that they are never going to let that happen.
translation.fr:
qu'il est absolument certain
que vous ne sortirez jamais.

translation.en: You are going to spend the rest of your life in here…
translation.fr: Vous passerez le reste de votre vie ici...

translation.en: because your family doesn't ever want to see you again.
translation.fr:
parce que votre famille
ne veut plus jamais vous revoir.

translation.en: [in wavering voice] It's something I wish someone had told me when I was young…
translation.fr:
J'aurais aimé entendre cela
à un jeune âge,

translation.en: so I could stop believing otherwise.
translation.fr: pour ne pas alimenter de faux espoirs.

translation.en: [softly] How different I would be if someone had.
But I have to tell you,
you have been subjected to enough pain.
translation.fr: que vous avez subi assez de souffrances.

translation.en: You deserve to be free from it.
I am only gonna tell you this once…
translation.fr: Je ne vous le dirai qu'une fois.

translation.en: but there is a letter opener on Dr. Hanover's desk.
translation.fr:
Il y a un coupe-papier
sur le bureau du Dr Hanover.

translation.en: I can take you there right now.
Would you like that?
-Si. -[camera flashes click]
Fellow Californians.
Hello, Jerry.
Glad you could make it.
Miss Ratched.
Do you take me for an idiot?
translation.fr: Vous me prenez pour un idiot ?

translation.en: Nurse Bucket informed me
that Father Murphy suffered cardiogenic shock.
translation.fr:
que le père Murphy
avait eu un choc cardiogénique.

translation.en: That's right.
Strange that the seal is freshly broken,
considering none of our patients are on this medication.
translation.fr:
vu qu'aucun patient
ne prend ce médicament.

translation.en: Of course it would be dangerous
for somebody with Father Murphy's condition to take these.
translation.fr:
qu'un patient atteint de sa maladie
en prenne.

translation.en: Wouldn't you say?
Yes.
I honestly don't know what you're asking me, Doctor.
translation.fr:
Je ne comprends pas
votre question, Docteur.

translation.en: Is there somebody in my office? Dr. Hanover, are you feeling all right?
translation.fr:
- Il y a quelqu'un dans mon bureau ?
- Vous vous sentez bien ?

translation.en: [breathing fast] Oh, God.
I don't…
How'd he get in here?
Clearly, he wasn't being supervised closely enough.
translation.fr: Il n'était pas surveillé d'assez près.

translation.en: God damn that Bucket!
-Dr. Hanover. -What am I going to do?
The press is here.
You are in a state of shock right now.
translation.fr: Vous êtes en état de choc.

translation.en: What has happened here is a tragedy, yes.
All my work. Everything, everything I'm fighting for…
translation.fr: Tout ce pour quoi je me bats...

translation.en: I'll be exposed.
-This-- this negligence will ruin me! -Dr. Hanover.
translation.fr: Je suis fichu. Cette négligence sera ma perte !

translation.en: -Will ruin me! -Dr. Hanover, you must stop!
I will take care of this.
You stand up tall and proud, you walk out of this room,
face the governor, and you be quick about it. He's waiting.
translation.fr:
allez voir le gouverneur, et vite.
Il attend.

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you.
And Dr. Hanover.
When you have a moment with the governor after his speech,
you tell him you've offered me a position here.
He will be pleased.
Yes. Yes, of course.
He'll be pleased.
[Wilburn] I am a child of California.
translation.fr: Je suis un enfant de Californie. Je suis fier de compter parmi ses fils.

translation.en: I'm proud to count myself amongst her native sons.
translation.fr: Je suis fier de compter parmi ses fils.

translation.en: I was raised on the promise of this great state.
translation.fr:
J'ai grandi dans cet État
riche de promesses.

translation.en: [Nurse Bucket] What exactly are you doing in there?
Hello, Nurse Bucket.
Dr. Hanover asked me to wash the towels in his private bathroom.
translation.fr:
Le Dr Hanover m'a demandé
de laver ses serviettes.

translation.en: He asked you to wash his towels together with the linen from the patients' rooms?
translation.fr:
Il vous a dit de laver ses serviettes
avec le linge des patients ?

translation.en: Maybe you haven't been listening to his lectures,
translation.fr: Vous ne l'avez peut-être pas écouté,

translation.en: but Dr. Hanover believes all human beings are equal.
translation.fr:
le Dr Hanover croit
à l'égalité entre tous.

translation.en: [Wilburn] I believe in the dreams of California, dreams shared by every restless soul
translation.fr:
Je crois aux rêves californiens,
partagés par les âmes fébriles

translation.en: who pulled up stakes and journeyed west to discover this land.
translation.fr:
qui ont tout quitté pour partir
vers l'ouest et découvrir cette terre.

translation.en: A place where our tomorrows are better than our yesterdays,
translation.fr: Un endroit où demain est meilleur qu'hier,

translation.en: and where we do not shrink from the responsibility that is our fellow man!
translation.fr:
où l'on ne recule pas devant
la responsabilité qu'est notre prochain.

translation.en: I promise you…
that we shall win together!
Hanover, it's been a pleasure.
Exceeded expectations.
Thank you, sir. We'll be in touch.
And that nurse…
Ratched.
Tell her I said goodbye.
There's not a lot of meat on her bones, but what's there is choice.
translation.fr:
Pas beaucoup de viande sur les os,
mais délicieuse tout de même.

translation.en: [man] Let's go!
[man] Edmund Tolleson, you're to be held at Lucia State Mental Hospital
translation.fr:
M. Tolleson, vous serez détenu
à l'hôpital de Lucia

translation.en: for a period of 120 days,
or until Dr. Richard Hanover can make the accurate recommendation regarding your fitness to stand trial.
translation.fr:
ou jusqu'à ce que le Dr Hanover puisse
déterminer votre capacité à être jugé.

translation.en: During this time, you are still a prisoner of the state of California, and will be treated as such.
translation.fr:
En attendant, vous êtes un prisonnier
et serez traité comme tel.

translation.en: Edmund Tolleson?
Is that you?
It's me. [gasps]
I found you.
I finally found you.
I don't wanna die.
You're not going to die, Edmund.
translation.fr: Tu ne vas pas mourir, Edmund.

translation.en: I promise.
